mnd11:55.2: andubandhanena → addubandhanena (s1-3, pts1, mr), baddho → bandho (s1-3, pts1, mr)
mnd11:99.2: dukhañcāpi → dukhaṃ vāpi (bj) | dukkhaṃ vāpi (s1-3, pts1)
mnd11:99.4: jāniyāmāti → jānissāma iti (bj) | jānissāmāti (si, mr) | jāniyāma iti (s1-3, pts1)
mnd11:100.2: vibhāvīyati atikkamīyati samatikkamīyati → vibhāviyyati atikkamiyyati samatikkamiyyati (si, s2, s3, pts1) | vibhaviyyati atikkamiyyati samatikkamiyyati (s1)
